channel.title: Zerked v1
channel.description:
[center]No Anti Leech, as if I release a source/client, I have no reason to put a anti-leech[/center]
Alright, I've been here a while, never really contributed, but only asked for help. Well I would like to contribute.
This is my server, but I will not be posting pictures, if you do not want to download, don't flame me, and don't post fake post such as "Virus" If you think I'm that low, then just don't download.
I spent countless hours working on this.
Things I've done, off the top of my head (Can't login, currently running another server) So this isen't everything.
Overloads, ( Log off whenever they expire, so you can re-pot) Added Donator system & Crown. Added Donator Shop & Benifits. Fixed countless dupes. Added Pking shop. Fixed thieving. Fixing switching & Maging. Added so you can autocast without Ancient Staff. Started Castle wars base. Added pking spots, other then edge. Added some custom items, removed un-needed Codes and items. Cleaned up Client.java slayer points Slayer points given from task. Increased the saving per player, so not many rollbacks. Balmung works on Dagg's Slayer helm works only against slayer monsters.
Here's the downloads:
[size=24pt]Source link-[/size] http://www.mediafire.com/?e0cthd86qvpw7i5
[size=24pt]Client link-[/size] http://www.mediafire.com/?wfecdo58rvzgjkr

item.title: Zerked v1
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

The home is mainly in edgeville, but You can move to where you think you want it.

Skillcape’s don’t work, as I had no reason to add at that time.

@Plox15, if you host it, I may come and check it out, but none of my friends really play rsps anymore, but I will check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Zerked v1
item.dc:creator: @EruptionX EruptionX
item.description:
@EruptionX wrote:

Finally.

A great source + good updates.

Im Using this. Thanks a lot Zerked.

Edit: Where’s home, and do skillcape emotes work?

Read full topic

item.title: Zerked v1
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

KK, I was just on my PI with my mates on my server… And I thought… Damn that server is ftw i should host it… so 0wn3v3ry if you wnna get your friends and come play it ill host if your not already… Send me pm ill give u client link.

SHOULD I?

Read full topic

item.title: Zerked v1
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

It was a Cleaned Delta base to start with, but I implemented some of PI’s bonus’s.

Also, Slayer points and slayer task we’re added, I added an extreme master area with many monsters for, of course, the masters.

Slayer helm/Balmung both work on slayer task, balmung working on Dags.

Read full topic
